About.title: About Us
About.mission: To teach with great dedication and responsibility to all the people that desire to obtain new communication abilities which will allow them to obtain better development opportunities in their personal and professional lives.
About.aboutUs: We are a young English educational company created in Tijuana, Mexico and in constant growth, committed to constantly improving our services. We are convinced that opportunities are created daily and it is the hard work, constancy and the fact that we demand ourselves the highest levels of quality that distinguish us from the rest.
motivation: Our students recommend us to family and friends.
Our commercial partners that trust us with tutoring their collaborators.
Our teachers, which feel proud to be part of our team and are treated fairly .
Serving our community, satisfying the need to communicate in a second language as part of their everyday lives in the busiest border in the world.
ourCompanyIdeology: If you can dream it, you can do it!  Walt Disney.
The measure of who we are is what we do with what we have! Vince Lombardi.
The best wat to predict the future is to create it!  Abraham Lincoln.
teachingMethod: We develop the four essential abilities for communication, we begin with the listening ability to subsequently speak, read and write
The first two abilities are developed during 80% of the effective class time, using resources such as repetition exercises, presentations, group interviews, videos or songs among others.
The remaining 20% of the time we develop reading and writing abilities focused on targeting the content at hand.
We use custom Link supportive teaching materials.

Services.title: Our Services
Services.description: Helping people learn English to communicate internationally

services.name: English Language Courses
services.text: Designed to aid non-native English speakers to excel in their social, academic and profesional environments.

services.name: Spanish Language Courses
services.text: Through our Spanish classes we provide non Hispanics the tools to integrate into our culture promptly. Helping people communicate effectively in their studies, entrepreneurship and business life.

services.name: Academic leveling
services.text: Specifically designed for Academic purposes. Middle School, High School and University students can receive personal help to reach a specific goal for THAT exam or language development needed.

services.name: English for young children (ages 4 and up)
services.text: The method we use is interactive and dynamic, which helps young students acquire the language through real conversations, between teaching and games, they will be acquiring the English knowledge in a intuitive and fun manner through the online experience.

Clases.title: Classes
Clases.description: We offer different type of courses depending on the customer's needs and interests.

clases.name: Personalized
clases.text: These classes are adapted to the student’s needs, your English level is irrelevant. The Teacher begins with the level of English which is understood by the student, guarateeing efficient and swift learning to accomplish the student's short term goals.

clases.name: Intensive
clases.text: Have you studied English before? Do you need to refresh your memory? Our intensive classes are designed to help you cover as much material as possible while continuously improving your fluency and pronunciation with a perfect combination of grammar assistance with our custom made activities.

clases.name: Business English
clases.text: This course is designed for those who wish to broaden their technical vocabulary to improve their profesional development.

clases.name: Workshops for Businesses
clases.text: Does your company have many native Mexican professionals who need to perfect their English communication? Our (online) workshops are tailored for you!! Our native speaking teachers excel in making people feel comfortable enough to speak, yet maintain that professional environment while pushing you to excel(bundles and discounts depend on amount of students, we w.

Team.title: Team
Team.description: We are a young English educational company created in Tijuana, Mexico and in constant growth, committed to constantly improving our services. We are convinced that opportunities are created daily and it is the hard work, constancy and the fact that we demand ourselves the highest levels of quality that distinguish us from the rest.

team.name: Venny
team.bio: I'm just a kid from Mexico, trying to have fun at every opportunity possible while innovating and pushing the line further. Competitiveness is my biggest drive.

team.name: Maribel
team.bio: I'm an English Teacher born and raised in Tijuana. I love teaching English because it's thrilling, challenging and rewarding. It also allows me to build bonds with my students and to witness life-changing experiences as they advance in their learning. Plus, I get to answer weird questions, and see the bigger picture about current events at home and abroad.

team.name: Enrique
team.bio: Hi! I'm Enrique, my desire is to pass my knowledge of the English language to as many people as possible, therefore obtaining the same or better opportunities that I obtained from my english teachers.

team.name: David
team.bio: I am a simple guy trying to help people learn and speak English as fluently as possible.
